title: Sparkly luxury visual layer (kid-friendly, accessible, reusable)

requirements.summary: Add an app-wide sparkly luxury visual layer (premium, warm gold shimmer) across key screens while keeping UI playful and highly readable.
acceptanceCriteria: Welcome, Login, Home, Games Hub, and Quiz screens visibly include sparkly/premium cues beyond just the cream/gold palette (e.g., sparkle overlay, starburst accents, shimmer highlights).
Sparkle effects do not obscure text/buttons and maintain high contrast and legibility.
Visual style remains playful/approachable (kid-friendly) rather than overly dark/serious.

file_operations.description: Wrap the existing luxury background with a reusable sparkle overlay layer (using the planned SparkleOverlay component) and add subtle corner starburst accents so the screen reads as premium without obscuring the logo/title/buttons.

Add the same sparkle overlay treatment to the full-screen luxury background and optionally a subtle shimmer/corner accent around the login card; ensure overlay sits behind the Card content and preserves legibility.

Add sparkly/premium cues to the Home background and to key surfaces (header card / nav area) using the reusable sparkle utilities/component, ensuring the greeting and nav remain high-contrast and readable.
Add a subtle sparkle overlay above the scene background but below content (and optionally a light starburst accent near the header) so scene-based screens still feel rich/premium.
Add a subtle sparkle overlay above the scene background but below quiz content; keep question/answer contrast strong and avoid overlays that interfere with buttons or feedback states.
Enhance the header surface with a subtle shimmer/sparkle utility class so premium cues appear consistently on scene-based screens that use ScreenHeader.

requirements.summary: Implement reusable sparkle styling utilities (CSS/Tailwind and a small React overlay component) and apply them consistently to luxury surfaces and backgrounds across multiple screens.
acceptanceCriteria: There is a single, reusable approach to adding sparkles (utilities/component) that is used in multiple screens.
Sparkle layer can be applied to both full-screen backgrounds (e.g., Welcome/Login/Home) and to key cards/headers (e.g., ScreenHeader or major cards) without layout breakage.
Sparkle styling works in both light and dark mode.

file_operations.description: Create a small, reusable React overlay component that can be dropped into full-screen containers or surfaces to render sparkle textures (and optional corner accents) without affecting layout (pointer-events disabled, controlled opacity/z-index).

Add reusable sparkle utility classes that integrate with existing luxury classes (e.g., apply-able alongside .luxury-gradient, .luxury-card, .luxury-surface): include non-obscuring overlay patterns, starburst accent positioning helpers, and dark-mode tuned opacity/contrast settings.
Extend Tailwind with any needed keyframes/animations and tokens for gentle shimmer/sparkle motion (slow, subtle) and ensure the utilities can be applied consistently in both light and dark mode.
Apply the reusable sparkle approach (SparkleOverlay and/or sparkle utility classes) on the full-screen background and key hero area so sparkles are not isolated to icons only.
Apply the same reusable sparkle approach on the full-screen background and optionally to the card frame; ensure no layout shifts and keep the login button text crisp.
Apply sparkle utility styling to ScreenHeader so multiple screens inherit a consistent premium shimmer treatment without duplicating code.

requirements.summary: Ensure sparkle effects are accessible and child-friendly: respect reduced-motion, avoid rapid flashing, and keep performance smooth.
acceptanceCriteria: When the user has reduced-motion enabled, sparkle animations are disabled or significantly reduced (static sparkle overlay is acceptable).
No fast flashing effects; sparkle animations are gentle and slow.
No noticeable jank during scrolling or interactions on the main screens after sparkles are added.

file_operations.description: Add a small hook to detect prefers-reduced-motion so components (e.g., SparkleOverlay) can disable or reduce animations when requested.

Respect reduced-motion by disabling animated shimmer/twinkle (fall back to static texture) and keep animations slow/subtle; ensure overlay rendering is lightweight (opacity/transform-based) to avoid scroll jank.

Add CSS safeguards for accessibility/performance: reduced-motion media query to disable sparkle animations, ensure no rapid flashing keyframes, and use gentle animation timing/opacity so text/buttons remain legible.

requirements.summary: Add generated static sparkle/glitter assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and wire them into key screens as overlays/background textures (no backend involvement).
acceptanceCriteria: New generated images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend (not via backend).

At least one generated sparkle texture/overlay is visibly used on Welcome and Login screens; scene-based screens (Games Hub/Quiz) also get a subtle sparkle overlay above the scene background but below content.
Assets render crisply on common screen sizes without visible tiling seams (or use intentional seamless tiling textures).

file_operations.description: Add the generated seamless soft gold sparkle/glitter texture asset at this exact path so it can be used as a repeating overlay background texture.
Add the generated corner starburst/shine accent set asset at this exact path for corner/edge premium highlights.
Add the generated subtle bokeh + glitter gradient haze overlay asset at this exact path for non-tiling, soft full-screen haze layers.

Wire the generated assets into the SparkleOverlay component so it can render: frontend/public/assets/generated/sparkle-overlay-seamless.dim_1024x1024.png (tiling texture), frontend/public/assets/generated/glitter-haze-overlay.dim_1920x1080.png (haze layer), and frontend/public/assets/generated/sparkle-corners-set.dim_1024x1024.png (corner accents).

Reference the generated assets via SparkleOverlay so the Welcome screen visibly uses at least the seamless sparkle texture and/or glitter haze overlay (from frontend/public/assets/generated/sparkle-overlay-seamless.dim_1024x1024.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/glitter-haze-overlay.dim_1920x1080.png) without obscuring the hero content.

Reference the generated assets via SparkleOverlay so the Login screen visibly uses at least the seamless sparkle texture and/or haze overlay and optional corner accents (including frontend/public/assets/generated/sparkle-corners-set.dim_1024x1024.png) while keeping the Card contents readable.

Place a subtle sparkle overlay above the scene background but below the content using the generated sparkle texture (frontend/public/assets/generated/sparkle-overlay-seamless.dim_1024x1024.png) to avoid tiling seams and preserve scene imagery.

Place a subtle sparkle overlay above the scene background but below the quiz content using the generated sparkle texture and/or haze (frontend/public/assets/generated/sparkle-overlay-seamless.dim_1024x1024.png and/or frontend/public/assets/generated/glitter-haze-overlay.dim_1920x1080.png) to reinforce the premium look without interfering with buttons.
